EmailTemplate.name: Substitute Pool Reminder (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your orientation is coming up!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your orientation is coming up! {!CampaignMember.FirstName}, {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} is almost here. Details are below! When: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c} Please let us know if you won't be able to make it. Call us at 206-682-6704 or email sfconsulting@501commons.org. See you soon! -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org Remember: Bring your MERIT STARS number with you. If you have not signed up for one yet, click here, https://apps.del.wa.gov/MERIT/Home/SignInRegister.
{!$Setup.Imagine_Settings__c.Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
